examples: Thank you for putting in a word for me.
Thank you for choosing our restaurant.
Thank you so much for asking me.
Thank you so much for coming in for the interview.
Thank you all for attending this staff meeting.
words.defineEn: something we say to someone to show we are grateful to them for something that they have done for us or given us
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó chúng tôi nói với ai đó để thể hiện rằng chúng tôi biết ơn họ vì điều gì đó mà họ đã làm cho chúng tôi hoặc cho chúng tôi

examples: The passengers waved goodbye to their loved ones from the ship's deck.
Goodbye, take care of yourself.
Well, you can wave goodbye to your brand new car, mister!
Goodbye, I hope to see you again.
She waved goodbye and was off to catch her train.
words.defineEn: a word we say when we are leaving or someone is leaving, or at the end of a phone call
words.defineVi: một từ chúng tôi nói khi chúng tôi rời đi hoặc ai đó đang rời đi, hoặc khi kết thúc cuộc gọi điện thoại

examples: I'm glad we can put this behind us.
We're glad to have you as part of our team.
I'm glad you read the riot act to Billy.
I felt glad to be back in harness.
I'm glad she's finally using her loaf.
words.defineVi: cảm thấy hạnh phúc hoặc hài lòng

examples: Her work has given pleasure to millions of readers.
She takes pleasure in her work.
The books in the library are available for checkout at their pleasure.
The murderer was imprisoned at His Majesty's pleasure.
I'm just going to find pleasure in perfect little moments like this.
words.defineEn: a feeling of great enjoyment and happiness
words.defineVi: một cảm giác vô cùng thích thú và hạnh phúc

examples: I would be grateful if you could call me back at your earliest convenience.
We should be grateful for the opportunities and blessings in our lives, and not focus on what we lack.
Although Sarah wasn't able to attend the event, her friends were grateful for her sincere apologies, and decided to take the will for the deed.

The heartbroken man consoled himself with the thought that it is better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all - he was grateful for the memories and experiences he had shared with his former partner.
Mark wasn't happy with his first draft of the book, but he's grateful for the chance to take a second bite at the cherry and revise it before submitting it to publishers.
words.defineEn: displaying or expressing thanks because someone has done something for one
words.defineVi: hiển thị hoặc bày tỏ sự cảm ơn vì ai đó đã làm điều gì đó cho một người

examples: Mind your own business!
You mind the cattle, Herb.
Mind if I take a rain check on that drink?
Travel broadens the mind.
My mind went totally blank.
words.defineEn: (often used in negative or question form) to be upset, annoyed or worried by something or someone
words.defineVi: (thường dùng ở thể phủ định hoặc nghi vấn) bực bội, khó chịu hoặc lo lắng vì điều gì hoặc ai đó

examples: The companies are two of a kind.
Thank you, you're very kind.
My aunt is a really kind sister to my father.
Thank you for your kind words, they made my day.
The lost child was helped by a kind police officer to find their way home.
words.defineEn: friendly and nice to others; caring about other people's feelings
words.defineVi: thân thiện và dễ mến với người khác; quan tâm đến cảm xúc của người khác

examples: Mentioning her new boyfriend just rubbed salt into the wound.
By mentioning rope in the house of a man who has been hanged?
When the old girl finally kicked the bucket there was no mention of yours truly in the will.
You struck a raw nerve when you mentioned divorce.
She could not bring herself to mention it.
words.defineEn: to say something about someone or something, without giving much detail
words.defineVi: để nói điều gì đó về ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó, mà không đưa ra nhiều chi tiết

examples: The organization supports various charitable causes through donations.
The increase had a ripple effect through the whole financial market.
The captain navigated the ship through rough waters with skill and expertise.
The train traveled through beautiful countryside.
The road continues through the village of Knightwick.
words.defineEn: from one side of something or someone to the other; into one side something and out of the other side
words.defineVi: từ một phía của một cái gì đó hoặc một người khác; vào một bên một cái gì đó và ra khỏi phía bên kia

examples: The vision seems a flight of fancy.
He found a cheap flight deal for his vacation.
I need to book a flight to New York for next week's business meeting.
Jimmy often has good ideas but his latest proposal is just a flight of fancy!
We had a great trip, but our flight home was badly delayed, which took the gilt off the gingerbread.
words.defineEn: the act of traveling in an airplane
words.defineVi: hành động đi du lịch trên máy bay

examples: Schools have welcomed such arrangements with open arms.
Welcome to my world!
"You're welcome."
When all fruit fails, welcome haws.
A port in a storm is a welcome thing.
words.defineEn: to meet and greet someone who has just arrived
words.defineVi: để gặp và chào một người vừa mới đến

examples: The slow healing process of the wound required regular care.
Goodbye, take care of yourself.
She will need around-the-clock care for the rest of her life.
I could care less about award shows.
The zookeepers took special care of the baby elephant, ensuring its healthy growth.
words.defineEn: to consider something or someone important and to have a feeling of worry or concern toward them
words.defineVi: để coi một cái gì đó hoặc ai đó quan trọng và có một cảm giác lo lắng hoặc quan tâm đối với họ

examples: The slow train arrived at the station behind schedule.
Has the train from Bristol arrived?
The fast train arrived at the destination in no time.
Replies to the advertisement are arriving in fits and starts.
The elevator arrived after a couple of minutes of waiting.
words.defineEn: to reach a location, particularly as an end to a journey
words.defineVi: để đạt được một địa điểm, đặc biệt là kết thúc một cuộc hành trình

examples: The journey home through the storm was absolute murder!
The journey to the airport takes about half an hour.
They had to continue their journey on foot.
The ticket for the bus is valid for a single journey.
The adventurer used the tail fat as a survival resource during their journey in the wilderness.
words.defineEn: the act of travelling between two or more places, especially when there is a long distance between them
words.defineVi: hành động di chuyển giữa hai hoặc nhiều nơi, đặc biệt là khi có khoảng cách xa giữa chúng

examples: The incident says an awful lot about his character.
The clock says ten past two.
His angry glance said it all.
To say a prayer.
The clock said three o'clock.
words.defineEn: to use words and our voice to show what we are thinking or feeling
words.defineVi: để sử dụng các từ và giọng nói của chúng tôi để hiển thị những gì chúng tôi đang suy nghĩ hoặc cảm thấy

examples: The TV quiz was more fun than a barrel of monkeys!
The colorful bowtie pasta added a fun twist to the classic mac and cheese dish.
He sounds about as much fun as a wet weekend in Carmarthenshire.
I had so much fun at the family reunion.
The fans had fun and got their money's worth.
words.defineEn: the feeling of enjoyment or amusement
words.defineVi: cảm giác thích thú hoặc giải trí

examples: Bad luck often brings good luck.
Bad luck often brings good luck.
Your luck's in, Jimmy.
We just took pot luck.
Good luck getting that off your conscience.
words.defineEn: success and good fortune that is brought by chance and not because of one's own efforts and actions
words.defineVi: thành công và may mắn do tình cờ mang lại chứ không phải do nỗ lực và hành động của bản thân
